nodes.bodyText: I would rather remove this clone, it shouldn't be too costly but for OLTP queries it could add up since it's in the hot path.
this is a spotbugs issue, complaining about assigning a value that could be modified later. i can ignore it though.

reverted and added ignores for Spotbugs EI_EXPOSE_REP and EI_EXPOSE_REP2:
EI_EXPOSE_REP2: May expose internal representation by incorporating
reference to mutable object
We might want to replace java.util.Date with java.time.Instance, see
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36639154/convert-java-util-date-to-what-java-time-type
